brainly_data.question: President clinton modified the military's strict ban on gay soldiers, instituting a policy, _______________, by which officers would not seek out gays for dismissal from the armed forces.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: President clinton modified the military's strict ban on gay soldiers, instituting a policy, _______________, by which officers would not seek out gays for dismissal from the armed forces.
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The policy was called “Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell”.

top_answer.question: President clinton modified the military's strict ban on gay soldiers, instituting a policy, _______________, by which officers would not seek out gays for dismissal from the armed forces.
top_answer.subject: History
top_answer.text: The policy was called “Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell”.
